definition: to batter/combo (hit) (gaming)/(volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit/double contact
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: What happens is you go overtime?
Got a combo of 50 in Arcade mode.
sentences.chinese: 在街機模式下完成50連擊。

sentences.english: Shadowstep now awards one combo point.
sentences.chinese: 暗影步現在獎勵一個連擊點數。

sentences.english: Exploding Dragon sometimes hits 2x if the target is moving during the animation.
sentences.chinese: 當目標移動時施法，爆炎龍有時會造成2連擊。

sentences.english: The best way to deal with haters is what I call the "one-two punch."
sentences.chinese: 對付這些嫉妒者的最好辦法就是我所說的“連擊法”。

sentences.english: A fritter is made by deep-frying a small portion of batter or …
sentences.chinese: 一猶疑，是由油炸的一小部分連擊或者。

sentences.english: He seemed to be claiming that the telephone system with several blows.
sentences.chinese: 他舉起粗笨的管子，連擊幾下就把電話設備砸爛了。

sentences.english: He had been bludgeoned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被大頭短棒連擊致死。

sentences.english: Try to jump to the same type of blocks continuously to get COMBO points! .
sentences.chinese: 嘗試跳轉到同一類型的街區不斷得到連擊點。

sentences.english: He had been bludgeoned to death.

definition: to start the servers (for an online game, typically after the system has been shut down for maintenance, upgrade etc)
lit. to shoot from both sides (idiom)/fig. to display ambidexterity/to slap with one hand and then the other, in quick succession/to use both feet equally (football)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
pinyin: xin1 you3 ling2 xi1 yi1 dian3 tong1

definition: flowery of fist with fancy footwork (idiom)/highly embellished and ineffectual/fancy but impractical skills/all show and no go/pugilistic wankery
